Discover the endless amenities at Sonata!
The unique Sky Lounge features fire-pits, BBQ’s, TV’s, and lounge seating.
The impressive indoor movie theater is the perfect place for movie and game nights.
On-site storage is available, along with a convenient heated bike storage room.
The chic apartment homes feature designer interiors and upgraded finishes and appliances.
Come discover inspired living at Sonata!
